about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS CONTENT

All the tracks from Unusual Findings are written by Tomas Ferrero - vocalist and bass player of Argentinian band Rayos Laser, that has been nominated at MTV Europe Awards and Latin Grammy Awards. All songs are available with covers, credits and full meta tags.

TRACK LIST

01 A Humble Place
02 But The Town Seems So Calm
03 Carpenter Love
04 Charging Energy
05 Dawn is Coming
06 Lights in the sky
07 Looming Danger
08 Relentless Visitor
09 Serpiente River
10 Something Is Off
11 Striding Nights
12 THE BULL
13 The Miracle Was Over
14 Underground Secret
15 Unexpected Creatures
16 Unusual Thing to Find

CREDITS

Music composed by Tomas Ferrero.
